title: This Hidden New AI Model From Google Beats OpenAI's Dall-E and MidJourney—For Free
description: Tucked behind a drop-down menu in Google’s suite of AI tools, ImageFX makes photorealistic, high quality images —and even gives you suggestions to improve them. See how it compares against its rivals.

title: Bipartisan Lawmakers Seek to Repeal SEC Crypto Accounting Policy
description: Senator Cynthia Lummis and Representatives Wiley Nickel and Mike Flood introduced a joint resolution to repeal SEC Staff Accounting Bill 121.

title: Bankrupt FTX wants to sell $175 million claim against Genesis to aid creditor repayment
description:
FTX bankruptcy estate intends to sell its $175 million general unsecured claim against the collapsed crypto lender Genesis, according to a Feb. 2 court filing. FTX proposed to divest these claims through public auctions or private transactions, either in entirety or in parts, with single or multiple purchasers. The generated funds would be used to […]

The post Bankrupt FTX wants to sell $175 million claim against Genesis to aid creditor repayment appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Binance Freezes $4.2 Million in XRP Following Major Hack on Ripple Co-Founder’s Wallets
description: As CryptoGlobe reported, on January 31, the cryptocurrency world was shaken by the news of a massive hack targeting Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen’s personal wallet, resulting in the theft of $112 million worth of XRP. This incident has been marked as the largest hack of 2024 to date. Larsen, who is the executive chairman of […]

title: Bitcoin refuses to make bigger correction
description: The bitcoin correction took it down a total of 21%. Since then, the price has refused to go lower, and now there is even a chance of an assault on $44,000 and above.

title: Ripple devs propose updates following recent XRPL AMM approval
description: Following the passing of the XLS-30D amendment on Jan. 31, which introduced the Automated Market Maker (AMM) feature to the XRP Ledger (XRPL), Ripple’s development team has moved to address and propose crucial updates aimed at refining this newly added…

title: From Lacrosse Jerseys to Wine: Cardano’s Pioneering Blockchain Applications of the Future
description: The collaboration between the Cardano Foundation and Epoch Sports introduces NFC-embedded lacrosse jerseys, setting a new standard in sports merchandise by enhancing intellectual property protection and consumer engagement. Cardano’s blockchain technology is applied in the wine industry to ensure the authenticity and traceability of products, combating counterfeiting and streamlining export processes. The Cardano Foundation, a [...]

title: Analyzing Bitcoin’s Decline After ETF Approvals; Polkadot and InQubeta Tipped for Success
description: The crypto market took a downturn following the SEC decision on Bitcoin ETFs in January. While the market initially rode the excitement wave in anticipation of approval, the Bitcoin ETF market effects post-launch were a decline, with the price of BTC dipping as low as $38,000. It has now recovered slightly but remains volatile. This [...]

title: Crypto Analyst Michael Van de Poppe Forecasts Polkadot To Soar 150%, New Addresses on Solana Surges, NuggetRush Presale About To Sell Out
description: Crypto analyst Michael van de Poppe has predicted that Polkadot will soar to $17.00. Hellomoon data shows that new addresses on Solana have hit 10.13 million in January.  NuggetRush is currently at the last round of its crypto presale and is up at $0.018. title: Bitfinex among first to list DYM, Native Token of Dymension
description:
ROAD TOWN, British Virgin Islands – February  2, 2024 – Bitfinex (https://www.bitfinex.com/), a premier digital asset trading platform, announced today that it will be among the first exchanges to list DYM, the native token of Dymension.  Dymension, a layer-1 blockchain within the Cosmos ecosystem, aims...
